name: Octo-Fiesta
description: A Subsonic API proxy server that transparently integrates multiple music streaming providers as sources. When a song is not available in your local Navidrome library, it is automatically fetched from your configured provider, downloaded, and served to your Subsonic-compatible client. The downloaded song is then added to your library, making it available locally for future listens.

notes.text: Configure Qobuz and Deezer tokens in appsettings.json
